mapper.sql: a.id_ AS "id", a.user_id_ AS "userId", a.enguser_id_ AS "enguserId", a.create_date_ AS "createDate", a.update_date_ AS "updateDate", a.remarks_ AS "remarks", a.del_flag_ AS "delFlag", a.blank_one_ AS "blankOne", a.blank_two_ AS "blankTwo"
LEFT JOIN enguser u2 ON u2.id_ = a.enguser_id_
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_enguser( id_, user_id_, enguser_id_, create_date_, update_date_, remarks_, del_flag_, blank_one_, blank_two_ ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{enguserId}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{blankOne}, #{blankTwo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_enguser SET id_ = #{id}, user_id_ = #{userId}, enguser_id_ = #{enguserId}, create_date_ = #{createDate}, update_date_ = #{updateDate}, remarks_ = #{remarks}, del_flag_ = #{delFlag}, blank_one_ = #{blankOne}, blank_two_ = #{blankTwo} WHERE id_ = #{id}
